Package clientSide.stubs

Class TableStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.TableStub
  • public class TableStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the Table. It instantiates a remote reference to the barber shop. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TableStub​(java.lang.String serverHostName, int serverPortNum)
      Instantiation of a stub to the Table

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addUpOnesChoices()
      Operation add up ones choices Called by the first student to arrive to add up a companions choice to the order
      void deliverPortion()
      Operation deliver portion Called by the waiter, to deliver a portion
      void describeOrder()
      Operation describe the order Called by the first student to arrive to describe the order to the waiter Blocks waiting for waiter to come with pad Wake waiter up so he can take the order
      void endEating()
      Operation end eating Called by the student to signal that he has finished eating his meal
      boolean everybodyHasChosen()
      Operation everybody has chosen Called by the first student to arrive to check if all his companions have choose or not Blocks if not waiting to be waker up be a companion to give him his preference

      Obtain id of the first student to arrive
      int getLastToEat()
      Obtain id of the last student to arrive
      void getThePad()
      Operation get the pad It is called by the waiter when an order is going to be described by the first student to arrive Waiter Blocks waiting for student to describe him the order
      boolean hasEverybodyFinishedEating()
      Operation has everybody finished eating Called by the student to wait for his companions to finish eating
      boolean haveAllClientsBeenServed()
      Operation have all clients been served Called by the waiter to check if all clients have been served or not
      boolean haveAllCoursesBeenEaten()
      Operation have all courses been eaten Called by the student to check if there are more courses to be eaten Student blocks waiting for the course to be served
      void honourBill()
      Operation honour the bill Called by the student to pay the bill Student blocks waiting for bill to be presented and signals waiter when it's time to pay it
      void informCompanion()
      Operation inform companion Called by a student to inform the first student to arrive about their preferences Blocks if someone else is informing at the same time
      void joinTalk()
      Operation join the talk Called by the first student to arrive so he can join his companions while waiting for the courses to be delivered
      void prepareOrder()
      Operation prepare the order Called by the student to begin the preparation of the order (options of his companions)
      void presentBill()
      Operation present the bill Called by the waiter to present the bill to the last student to arrive
      void readMenu()
      Operation read the menu Called by the student to read a menu, wakes up waiter to signal that he already read the menu
      void returnBar()
      Operation return to the bar It is called by the waiter to return to the bar to the appraising situation state
      void saluteClient​(int studentIDBeingAnswered)
      Operation salute the client It is called by the waiter when a student enters the restaurant and needs to be saluted Waiter waits for the student to take a seat (if he hasn't done it yet) Waiter waits for student to finish reading the menu
      void seatAtTable()
      Operation siting at the table Student comes in the table and sits (blocks) waiting for waiter to bring him the menu Called by the student (inside enter method in the bar)

      Set id of the first student to arrive
